## Mentor Requirements

Essential qualifications:

- Significant experience in R package development
- Active participation in the R/open source community
- Experience in code review and technical documentation
- Time availability of 2-3 hours per week for 6 months

## Mentor Responsibilities

As a mentor, you will:

- Guide 1-2 Champions through their project development
- Provide regular code review and feedback
- Attend monthly mentor coordination meetings
- Support Champions in community engagement
- Review technical documentation

## Application Process

1. **Review Mentor Guidelines**
   - Program structure and timeline
   - Mentorship expectations
   - Time commitments

2. **Prepare Required Information**
   - Professional background
   - Open source contributions
   - Mentoring experience
   - Areas of expertise

3. **Complete Application Form**

::: {.application-form}
<form action="https://formspree.io/f/your-form-id" method="POST">
  <div class="form-group">
    <label for="name">Full Name *</label>
    <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required>
  </div>

  <div class="form-group">
    <label for="email">Email Address *</label>
    <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required>
  </div>

  <div class="form-group">
    <label for="github">GitHub Username *</label>
    <input type="text" id="github" name="github" required>
  </div>

  <div class="form-group">
    <label for="expertise">Areas of Expertise *</label>
    <textarea id="expertise" name="expertise" rows="4" required></textarea>
  </div>

  <div class="form-group">
    <label for="mentoring">Previous Mentoring Experience</label>
    <textarea id="mentoring" name="mentoring" rows="4"></textarea>
  </div>

  <div class="form-group">
    <label for="motivation">Why do you want to be a mentor? *</label>
    <textarea id="motivation" name="motivation" rows="6" required></textarea>
  </div>

  <div class="form-group">
    <label for="cv">Upload CV/Resume (PDF) *</label>
    <input type="file" id="cv" name="cv" accept=".pdf" required>
  </div>

  <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit Application</button>
</form>
:::

## Selection Process

1. Application Review
2. Experience Verification
3. Interview with Program Coordinators
4. Final Selection and Onboarding
